Students and parents, please click here for updates on A.P classes at JV.

meta.name: description

link.title: Juniata Valley Elementary School - News

form.name: aspnetForm

span.p: Governor Wolf has announced the closure of school for the remainder of the current school year. The Juniata Valley School District will continue to provide Review and Enrichment activities. Please continue to visit the District Website for announcements and updates.

div.class: hidden-xs col-sm-4 col-md-3 col-lg-3 backgroundcolor leftPanel

h1.span: AP Exam Updates for Schools Impacted by Current School Closures

b.u: AP Exam Updates for Schools Impacted by Current School Closures

span.p: Please review the link below with your parents or guardians. Please email Mr. Estep (mestep@jvsd.org) with how you would like to proceed with the AP exam options provided by the College Board.
Option 1: Cancel your registration to take the AP exam at no cost. (Your money will be reimbursed)
Option 2: Take the AP exam online at home as outlined by the College Board in the link below.

p.b: Below are the primary exam dates. Makeup exam dates can be found below the Course Specific Exam Information.
United States Government and Politics (Mr. Musser)
